00104 #define HPSS_SSM "hpss_ssm"
00105 #define HPSS_KEYTAB "/krb5/hpssserver.keytab"
00106 int lru_entry_to_str( LRU_data_t data, char * str) 
00107 {
00108   cache_entry_t * pentry = NULL ;
00109   
00110   pentry =  (cache_entry_t *)data.pdata ;
00111   
00112   return sprintf( str, "Pentry: Addr %p, state=%d", pentry, pentry->internal_md.valid_state ) ;
00113 } /* lru_entry_to_str */

00115 int lru_clean_entry( LRU_entry_t * entry, void * adddata) 
00116 {
00117   return 0 ;
00118 } /* lru_clean_entry */

00187   /* Init the Buddy System allocation */

00189     {
00190       fprintf( stderr, "Error while Initing the Buddy system allocator"  ) ;
00191       exit( 1 ) ;
00192     }
00193  
00194   /* init debug */
00195   SetNamePgm( "test_cache_inode" ) ;
00196   SetNameFunction( "main" ) ;
00197   SetNameFileLog( "/dev/tty" ) ;
00198 
00199 #if defined( _USE_GHOSTFS )
00200   if( argc != 2 )
00201     {
00202       fprintf( stderr, "Please set the configuration file as parameter\n" ) ;
00203       exit( 1 ) ;
00204     }
00205 #endif 
00206   
00207   /* Obtention du nom de la machine */
00208   if( gethostname( localmachine, sizeof( localmachine ) ) != 0 )
00209     {
00210       DisplayErrorLog( ERR_SYS, ERR_GETHOSTNAME, errno ) ;
00211       exit( 1 ) ;
00212     }
00213   else
00214     SetNameHost( localmachine ) ;
00215   
00216   InitDebug( NIV_FULL_DEBUG ) ;
00217   AddFamilyError( ERR_FSAL, "FSAL related Errors", tab_errstatus_FSAL ) ;  AddFamilyError( ERR_CACHE_INODE, "FSAL related Errors", tab_errstatus_cache_inode ) ;
00218   
00219   /* creating log */
00220   voie_fsal.fd = fileno( stdout ) ;
00221   AddLogStreamJd( &log_desc_fsal, V_FD,voie_fsal,NIV_FULL_DEBUG,SUP);

00223   voie_cache.fd = fileno( stdout ) ;
00224   AddLogStreamJd( &log_desc_cache, V_FD,voie_cache,NIV_FULL_DEBUG,SUP);
00225   
00226   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Starting the test" ) ;
00227   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "-----------------" ) ;
00228 
00229 #if defined( _USE_GHOSTFS )  
00230 
00231   if (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2path( configfile, 
00232                                              strlen( configfile )+1,
00233                                              &(init_param.fs_specific_info.definition_file ) ) ) )
00234     {
00235       DisplayErrorJd(log_desc_fsal,ERR_FSAL,status.major,status.minor);

00238 #elif defined( _USE_HPSS )  
00239

00274   /* 2-common info (default) */

00290   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, cansettime);

00292   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, maxread);
00293   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, maxwrite);
00294   
00295   /* 3- fsal info*/
00296   init_param.fsal_info.log_outputs = log_desc_fsal;
00297   
00298   /* Init */
00299   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_Init( &init_param ) ) )
00300     {
00301       DisplayErrorJd(log_desc_fsal,ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00302     }
00303 
00304    /* getting creds */
00305   uid=getuid(); 
00306   
00307   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_GetUserCred( uid, NULL, &cred ) ) )
00308     {
00309       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00310     }
00311   
00312   /* Init of the cache inode module */
00313   cache_param.hparam.index_size       = 31 ;
00314   cache_param.hparam.alphabet_length  = 10 ; /* Buffer seen as a decimal polynom */
00315   cache_param.hparam.nb_node_prealloc = 100 ;
00316   cache_param.hparam.hash_func_key    = cache_inode_fsal_hash_func ; 
00317   cache_param.hparam.hash_func_rbt    = cache_inode_fsal_rbt_func ;
00318   cache_param.hparam.compare_key      = cache_inode_compare_key_fsal ;
00319   cache_param.hparam.key_to_str       = display_key ;
00320   cache_param.hparam.val_to_str       = display_value ;
00321 
00322   if( ( ht = cache_inode_init( cache_param, &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00323     {
00324       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error %d while init hash ", cache_status ) ;
00325     }
00326   else
00327     DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Hash Table address = %p", ht ) ;
00328 
00329   /* We need a cache_client to acces the cache */  
00330   cache_client_param.log_outputs = log_desc_cache;
00331   cache_client_param.attrmask = FSAL_ATTRS_MANDATORY|FSAL_ATTR_MTIME|FSAL_ATTR_CTIME|FSAL_ATTR_ATIME  ; 
00332   cache_client_param.nb_prealloc_entry = 1000 ;
00333   cache_client_param.nb_pre_dir_data = 200 ;
00334   cache_client_param.nb_pre_parent = 1200 ;
00335   cache_client_param.nb_pre_state_v4 = 100 ;
00336   
00337   cache_client_param.lru_param.nb_entry_prealloc = 1000 ;
00338   cache_client_param.lru_param.entry_to_str = lru_entry_to_str ;
00339   cache_client_param.lru_param.clean_entry = lru_clean_entry ;
00340 
00341   cache_client_param.grace_period_attr = 0 ; 
00342   cache_client_param.grace_period_link = 0 ; 
00343 
00344   /* Init the cache_inode client */
00345   if( cache_inode_client_init( &client, cache_client_param , 0 ) != 0 )
00346     exit( 1 ) ;
00347 
00348   /* Getting the root of the FS */
00349   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2path( "/", 2, &pathroot) )) )
00350     {
00351       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00352       exit( 1 ) ;
00353     }
00354   
00355   attribs.asked_attributes = cache_client_param.attrmask ;
00356   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_lookupPath( pathroot, &cred, &root_handle, &attribs ) ) ) )
00357     {
00358       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00359       exit( 1 ) ;
00360     }
00361   fsdata.cookie = 0 ;
00362   fsdata.handle = root_handle ;
00363   
00364   /* Cache the root of the FS */
00365   if( ( cache_entry_root = cache_inode_make_root( &fsdata, 1, ht, &client, &cred, &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00366     {
00367       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't init fs's root" ) ;
00368       exit( 1 ) ;
00369     }
00370 
00371   /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00372   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "cea", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00373     {
00374       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00375       exit( 1 ) ;
00376     }
00377 
00378   if( ( cache_entry_lookup = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00379                                                  name, 
00380                                                  &attrlookup, 
00381                                                  ht, 
00382                                                  &client, 
00383                                                  &cred, 
00384                                                  &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00385     {
00386       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00387       exit( 1 ) ;
00388     }
00389 
00390   /* Lookup a second time (entry should now be cached) */
00391   if( ( cache_entry_lookup2 = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00392                                                   name, 
00393                                                   &attrlookup, 
00394                                                   ht, 
00395                                                   &client, 
00396                                                   &cred, 
00397                                                   &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00398     {
00399       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_fsal, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00400       exit( 1 ) ;
00401     }
00402  
00403   if( cache_entry_lookup2 != cache_entry_lookup ) 
00404     {
00405       printf( "Error: lookup results should be the same\n" ) ;
00406       exit( 1 ) ;
00407     }
00408   
00409    /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00410   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "log", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00411     {
00412       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00413       exit( 1 ) ;
00414     }
00415 
00416   if( ( cache_entry_lookup3 = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00417                                                   name, 
00418                                                   &attrlookup, 
00419                                                   ht, 
00420                                                   &client, 
00421                                                   &cred, 
00422                                                   &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00423     {
00424       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00425       exit( 1 ) ;
00426     }
00427   
00428   if( ( cache_entry_lookup4 = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00429                                                   name, 
00430                                                   &attrlookup, 
00431                                                   ht, 
00432                                                   &client, 
00433                                                   &cred, 
00434                                                   &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00435     {
00436       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00437       exit( 1 ) ;
00438     }
00439 
00440   if( cache_entry_lookup3 != cache_entry_lookup4 ) 
00441     {
00442       printf( "Error: lookup results should be the same\n" ) ;
00443       exit( 1 ) ;
00444     }
00445   
00446 
00447   cache_inode_print_dir( cache_entry_root ) ;
00448 
00449   /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00450   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "cea", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00451     {
00452       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00453       exit( 1 ) ;
00454     }
00455   
00456   
00457   if( ( cache_entry_lookup = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00458                                                  name, 
00459                                                  &attrlookup, 
00460                                                  ht, 
00461                                                  &client, 
00462                                                  &cred, 
00463                                                  &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00464     {
00465       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00466       exit( 1 ) ;
00467     }
00468 
00469   /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00470   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "log", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00471     {
00472       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00473       exit( 1 ) ;
00474     }
00475 
00476   if( ( cache_entry_lookup = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00477                                                  name, 
00478                                                  &attrlookup, 
00479                                                  ht, 
00480                                                  &client, 
00481                                                  &cred, 
00482                                                  &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00483     {
00484       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00485       exit( 1 ) ;
00486     }
00487   
00488   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "---------------------------------" ) ;
00489   
00490   /* The end of all the tests */
00491   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "All tests exited successfully" ) ;
00492   
00493   exit( 0 ) ;
00494 } /* main */
